title: HTTP
description: HTTP remote (read-only access to HTTP servers)

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of HTTP host to connect to. E.g. 'https://example.com', or 'https://user:pass@example.com' to use username and password

headers.title: HTTP Headers
headers.description: Set HTTP headers for all transactions. Comma-separated list of key,value pairs

no_slash.title: No Slash
no_slash.description: Set this if the site doesn't end directories with /. Treats all files with Content-Type: text/html as directories

no_head.title: No HEAD Requests
no_head.description: Don't use HEAD requests to find file sizes. Makes directory listings much quicker but won't have times or sizes

no_escape.title: No Escape
no_escape.description: Do not escape URL metacharacters in path names
